oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Ryan Holladay - 2006-05-13
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Ryan Holladay from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on May 13, 2006. In support of the exhibit Banjo Man: the musical journey of Earl Scruggs.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ryan Holladay;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Recording begins in progress / (00:00) Ali Tonn with opening comments and band introductions / (04:10) Unidentified instrumental possibly Black Jack / (06:25) Bootleg John (Mark Holladay - vocal) / (10:21) My Caroline In Carolina (Mark - vocal) / (14:07) Blue Ridge Cabin Home (Mark - vocal) / (18:06) Foggy Mountain Special (Ryan Holladay - banjo) / (20:53) Turkey In The Straw (Ryan and Tyler Andol - banjo and fiddle) / (24:11) Mary Ann (Dick Nugent - vocal) / (28:25) Pan Handle Rag (Ryan - mandolin) / (31:50) El Cumbanchero (Ryan - mandolin) / (35:40) Questions (36:15) How did Ryan get started playing banjo / (36:50) When did Ryan start playing other instruments / (37:30) Comments about being on the road / (38:00) Balancing road work with school and being a kid / (38:45) Hooking up with Tyler / (39:10) Dickie talks about his background and his encouragement of Ryan / (40:50) What Music Ryan listens to today / (41:30) How Tyler balances music and life /

(42:30) Questions answered from the audience / (44:49) Rawhide (Ryan on mandolin) / (48:42) Highway 40 Blues (Dick Nugent - vocal) / (51:59) Big Mon (Ryan - Guitar) / (55:22) When It Rains (Ryan - banjo and vocal) / (01:01:22) Unidentified song likely titled The Hay's In The Barn / (01:05:30) Program End
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Holladay, Ryan; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
